item.title: ADIB and Rotana have partnered to introduce the exclusive ADIB Rotana Rewards Card
item.description:
Abu Dhabi Islamic Bank (ADIB) and Rotana, a hotel management company, have teamed up to introduce the ADIB Rotana Rewards Exclusive Card. This card allows members to earn Rotana Rewards points and enjoy special benefits whenever they use it for purchases. Source: ADIB. From left: Sarvesh Sarup, Global Head of Retail Banking, ADIB, and Omer Z. Kaddouri, President and CEO Rotana. This card is the first of its kind in the Central Eastern Europe & Middle East and Africa (CEEMEA) region to be co-branded with a hospitality company and developed by a local issuer...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/adib-and-rotana-have-partnered-to-introduce-the-exclusive-adib-rotana-rewards-card/

item.title: During the festive season, you can find exclusive Ferrero Rocher pralines at Pasticceria Ferrero in Singapore
item.description:
Celebrities Qi Yu Wu and Joanne Peh are pictured at the event. Ferrero Rocher has opened its first Southeast Asia store, Pasticceria Ferrero, at Singapore’s Wisma Atria on Orchard Road. This unique boutique is the only one in the world and will be open for the holiday season. A sneak peek before the official opening. The shop offers a unique experience, allowing customers to personalize chocolate boxes with limited-edition Ferrero pralines available only during this special time of year...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/during-the-festive-season-you-can-find-exclusive-ferrero-rocher-pralines-at-pasticceria-ferrero-in-singapore/

item.title: Exclusive Global Jay Chou content available on Spotify from December 16th to 18th
item.description:
Source: Spotify website. Music streaming platform, Spotify, released Asian pop star Jay Chou’s latest single, “What Kind of Man are You?” today. Spotify is offering fans an early preview of one of the year’s most anticipated albums, with the release of Jay Chou’s latest album, “Aiyo, Not Bad,” planned for December 26th, days before its official release. Recently ranked the most streamed Asian artist on Spotify’s Year in Music charts, Jay Chou is celebrating his return to the pop charts with this new album after a two-year hiatus...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/exclusive-global-jay-chou-content-available-on-spotify-from-december-16th-to-18th/

item.title: Subscribe to Grabz for exclusive insider privileges
item.description:
Source: Grabz website. Grabz is a subscription service that provides its members with exclusive benefits and special offers. Using location-based alerts and a wide range of affiliated businesses, the app connects its subscribers with exclusive deals and privileges in their city. For a monthly fee of S$15.98, premium members enjoy invitations to events and promotions such as discounted business class airfare and exclusive access to limited-edition luxury watches. Premium members also get access to the Grabz Concierge, a personalized booking service that assists members with securing reservations at clubs and getting on guest lists for exclusive parties in Singapore...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/subscribe-to-grabz-for-exclusive-insider-privileges/
